name: Mutaman
description:
This is a story of a vietnam veteran, that takes place in early 70th. He was poisoned with an experimental mutagen drug by an evil doctor. The doctor sends his minions to test drug's capabilities in field and capture the soldier.

Will you become a monster to stay alive? Or will you fight to death staying human?

ControlsKeybord

W,A,S, D - move

Space - jump

Left Mouse Button - Punch Right Mouse Button - Kick

Middle Mouse Button, Q - Special

E - Grab

Gamepad

D-pad - move

A - jump

X - Punch

B - Kick

Y - Special

RT - Grab

Mutate

When you defeat a powerful enemy, you can get a mutagen to enhance yourself with new ability and a new form. Or you can stay human for more challenge.

Fight enemies.

Your path to freedom lies through numerous enemies. You can punch them, kick them, even burn them! They all have their strengths, but you need to overcome them to face the final evil doctor. After all, they are just human.

Dead? Play again

There are 12 mutations, with different abilities, 80+ combinations in all.

5 types of enemies a mutant boss. Can you beat them all?

Tools

Unity 5

Photoshop cc

Google Drive
